description: Detects a suspicious process spawning a Chromium based browser process with the 'load-extension' flag to start a instance with custom extensions
author: Aedan Russell
frack113
X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Chromium Browser Instance Executed With Custom Extensions
query: (process.parent.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe") AND process.executable.text:("*\\brave.exe" OR "*\\chrome.exe" OR "*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\opera.exe" OR "*\\vivaldi.exe") AND process.command_line.text:"*\-\-load\-extension\=*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\*")
